home.title: REBUILD
home.keywords: REBUILD, RB, CRM, OA, business, systems, offical
home.introduction: REBUILD (RB) provides you with a basic platform for business data management and analysis, permissions and processes, data auditing, and message notification. It can easily design a more suitable business system based on the different needs of the enterprise.

opensource.title: Open Source
opensource.desc: The source code of REBUILD is completely open, you can modify it under the GPL3.0 license

selfdesign.title: Freely Design
selfdesign.desc: You can design your own business system according to the needs of enterprise processes

vpteam.title: VP Team
vpteam.desc: We have more than 10 years of experience in enterprise product development
